channel.title: Class Suggestion - Fallen Angel
channel.description:
[quote] <big>[color=Fuchsia]**Fallen Angel**[/color]<big>
**Neutral Killer**
**Angel Bless(Passive)** - If you are attacked at night, prevent the attacker. You will know if you prevented any attack. This passive is lost after successfully prevented an attack.
**Angel Light(Passive)** - Immune to bleed, Nightshade and death at night, also immune to prevention not directly targeted Fallen Angel.
**Drain Essence(Day)** - Drain a player life without knowing and they will die in 2 nights. You must discovered they are death immune. You can only drain 1 player at the same time. Bypass night immunity. Unlimited Use.
**Dark Light(Day)** - Target a player, learn their class type and make them target another player of your choice tonight. 4 Use. Cannot target King. Can Use D1
**Ivocation of Death(Night)** - Attack a player, killing them. Unlimited Use.
**Darkened Feather(Night)** - Attack 2 player, will stop if either of them would survive and learn both faction, discover they are death immune or not. 2 Use
*Your objects is to eliminate player in the main factions and any **Neutral** that dare to stand in your way.* [/quote]

item.title: Class Suggestion - Fallen Angel
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
Learning class technic is too strong, even Watch Carefully is only 2 use

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion - Fallen Angel
item.dc:creator: richiereapbox
item.description:
Possible rewrite.

[quote]
Fallen Angel

Neutral Killer

Angel Bless(Passive) - 3 The first 3 times you are attacked, your attacker will be prevented instead of learning you are death immune. You will know whenever you used this passive.

Angel Light(Passive) - Immune to bleed, Nightshade and death at night. Prevention immune, but not occupy or redirect immune.

Drain Essence (Day) - Drain a player’s lifeforce, they will not know and die in 2 nights. You must have discovered they are death immune. Unlimited Use. If you drain a player who was simply temporarily Night Immune, the player will be notified, and you will not.

Dark Light(Day) - Target a player, they will be redirected to another player of your choice. You will know if they was unable to redirect. 3 uses. Cannot target King. Can Use D1

Invocation of Death (Night) - Attack a player. Unlimited Use.

Darkened Feather (Night) - Attack 2 players, if either would survive both survive instead. Will instead learn their faction and if they death immune or not. 2 Use. (Affected by Frames and other faction hiding abilities).

Your objects is to eliminate player in the main factions and any Neutral that seek to cause you harm.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion - Fallen Angel
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
-upside:
Many kill
Have many info
Easily prove as drunk
Easy to become PK
-downside:
Can be found when attacker kept on getting prevented on you
The prevention immune may backfire you
